problem.markdown:
>>What is the fastest growing source of electricity in the world?<< ( ) algae ( ) natural gas ( ) nuclear ( ) solar (x) wind
[explanation] Currently, wind is the fastest growing source of electricity in the world. [explanation]
problem.p: What is the fastest growing source of electricity in the world?

choicegroup.label: What is the fastest growing source of electricity in the world?

div.p: Currently, wind is the fastest growing source of electricity in the world.
